bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with zi yi si 自縊死 , [appearance of] death from hanging oneself. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry ji 雞 quotes Zhou hou bei ji fang 肘後備急方 : 卒縊垂死：心下猶温者，勿斷繩。刺雞 冠血滴口中，以安心神 , “For sudden [appearance of] death from hanging , when the region below the [victim’s] heart is still warm, do not sever the rope. Pierce a cock’s comb and drip the blood into [the victim’s] mouth to calm his heart and spirit”.
